title.rendered: Peshawar vs Multan, Pakistan T20 League 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Peshawar: Saim Ayub, Babar Azam (c), Mohammad Haris, Tom Kohler-Cadmore, Rovman Powell, Haseebullah Khan (wk), Aamer Jamal, Wahab Riaz, Mujeeb Ur Rahman, Azmatullah Omarzai, Arshad Iqbal

Multan: Shan Masood, Mohammad Rizwan (c & wk), Rilee Rossouw, Tim David, David Miller, Kieron Pollard, Anwar Ali, Usama Mir, Abbas Afridi, Mohammad Ilyas, Ihsanullah

Pitch Report

Venue: Pindi Club Ground, Rawalpindi

(Based on the last three games)

1st innings average score: 223

2nd innings average score: 195

Wickets per innings: 5

Type: Good for batting

Wins

Batting 1st: 33%

Batting 2nd: 67%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

The conditions seem perfect for another Babar Azam show: he has hit five fifties in 10 innings against Multan, averages 62 at the venue, and scored 115 and 50 in the last two matches.

Saim Ayub has scores of 53 and 23 versus Multan. At the venue, he has aggregated 380 runs at an average of 42 and at a whopping strike rate of 172.

Mohammad Rizwan enjoys batting in Rawalpindi. He has hit 663 runs at 37, including the highest score of 99*.

Peshawar bowlers are yet to find a way to stop Kieron Pollard. He has been dismissed only once in six innings, hitting 12 fours and eight sixes to aggregate 130 runs.

Shan Masood has a century to his name and averages 32 at the venue.

Wahab Riaz has scalped 56 wickets at the venue, including a five-for. He has also generated bonus points for five maiden overs.

In three of the last four matches, Tom Kohler-Cadmore produced bonus points for thirty once and fifty twice. He averages 77 (154 runs) during this period.

Ihsanullah and Abbas Afridi are having an excellent time with the ball. While Ihsanullah is the top wicket-taker in the tournament (18 wickets at a superb strike rate of 10.5), Abbas has picked at least a wicket in six of the seven matches at a strike rate of 10.

Anwar Ali has picked six wickets in the last three T20s. He is also capable of scoring some quick runs down the order.

In the last three matches at the venue, openers have scored three centuries and two fifties.
